subject: Basketball
Officiating (Sports)
Sentences (Criminal)
lead_paragraph: Tim Donaghy, the former N.B.A. referee who admitted to betting on games he officiated, was sentenced to 15 months in prison on Tuesday morning.
snippet: Tim Donaghy, the former N.B.A. referee who admitted to betting on games he officiated, was sentenced to 15 months in prison on Tuesday morning.
